17 anos depois do lançamento do Half Life 2, é um game de uma histórial incrível, gráficos incríveis mesmo nessa época, jogabilidade incrivel, a trilha sonora no game espetacular, é um grande clássico dos jogos de FPS. Vale a pena jogar.

great game

A truly amazing game, no overhyped cutscenes around every corner, only the game, the pure gameplay where you learn about events and people trough playing the game and being aware of your surroundings.
Graphics that are ahead of it's time with revolutionary physics and face animation methods that influenced the gaming industry and set the bar for a true experience that someone should get when playing a game.
This game, unlike many new AAA titles was made with love and care by developers always thinking of what the player will do or what the player will look at so they can minimise the amount of custcenes and give the player control over the main character- Gordon Freeman.
Uno de los mejores juegos de aventura de valve.
Half-Life 2 is a Good Game.

Absolutely Marvelous!

I have played throught this game multiple times, and it never grows old or boring. 
This is, or at least one of, the greatest first person action games ever developed.
My one tiny nitpick is that you have to have played the original Half-Life to understand what is happening, and who some of the characters are.

A fantastic game! The graphics, the story, the atmosphere, the music, and especially the gameplay itself: everything works astonishingly well together. I have rarely been so captivated by a game, and it is no wonder that it has endured so many years and still remains a masterpiece. I can strongly recommend it!
A must play Game.

Tomamos las riendas de el doctor Gordon Freeman, un físico teórico que, después de los eventos ocurridos en Half Life, despierta de una siesta de 20 años y se da cuenta que el mundo que conocía ha cambiado por completo. Una raza avanzada de alienígenas a colonizado el planeta tierra y es nuestro deber llevar a los pocos sobrevientes humanos a la salvación a través de una aventura colosal. 10/10

El mejor juego de la vida, lastima que Valve haya decidido no continuar con el juego que los llevo a la fama.
El saga empezo hace 20 años y aun sigo divirtiendonos con su acción frenetica y radical, pasas de matar alienigenas a matar zombies, soldados, etc. Una cantidad de enemigos y armas; Hay coches y lanchas, tienes a tu poder un arma de gravedad que te permite cojer objetos pesados y peligrosos para tirarselos a tus enemigos, no hay cinematicas, el juego te cuenta su historia de una manera sorprendente; da igual todo lo que diga, el juego es de lo puto mejor y solo lo sabras hasta que lo juegues, y si no te gusta puedes ir bien a la ******, nah, pero el juego esta bueno de verdad, merece toda la pena.
*SALIO HALF-LIFE ALYX EN 2019 BITCHEEES*
10/10 класека хуле

A timeless classic, probably the greatest game of it's generation and still holds up today in a lot of respects, I shouldn't have to say more as the legacy of this game really speaks for itself, from the memorable characters, amazing story, the graphics that are truly beautiful creation of it's time and even stands up to this day, and the art design from City 17, The Combine, and so on, it's all beautifully designed and if you haven't already, do yourself a favor and play it. 13/10

Думаю нет смысла пизать грандиозный, затрагивающий за душу обзор. Просто скажу, что это игра шедевр и если вы в неё не играли, то либо вы очень молоды и кроме дотки и кс больше не играете в другие игры, либо стары как динозавры и компухтеры ентава очень сложно для вас, есть, конечно, ещё и третий вариат, коим я и являлся- затупок пропустивший шедевр и сыгравший в него спустя овердохрена времени, но сыграл же) Она очень хороша и по современным меркам, но, чтобы ощутить ещё божественность, надо было играть когда она только вышла. НО! мне она и сейчас очень зашла, а ещё 2 последующих часит! Мммм...вкусненько, в общем, не играл?!- исправляйся. Играл?- красава)
